title: Denmark Manufacturing Production
description: Manufacturing Production in Denmark increased 20.30 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Manufacturing Production in Denmark averaged 2.27 percent from 1986 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 30.40 percent in April of 1986 and a record low of -25.20 percent in April of 2009. In Denmark, Manufacturing is the most important sector of industry and accounts for 96 percent of total production. The biggest segments within Manufacturing are: pharmaceuticals (20 percent of total manufacturing); food products, beverages and tobacco (14 percent); machinery (14 percent); furniture and other manufacturing (13 percent); metals (9 percent); chemicals and oil refineries (7 percent); and plastic, glass and concrete (7 percent). This page provides - Denmark Manufacturing Production - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistics Denmark
